trans-unit.resname: G11·1 | Bitterblossom | Card Name
G11·1 | Bitterblossom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

trans-unit.resname: G11·2 | Sword of Fire and Ice | Card Name
G11·2 | Sword of Fire and Ice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from blue.
trans-unit.target: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from blue.

trans-unit.resname: G11·2 | Sword of Fire and Ice | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target and you draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: G11·2 | Sword of Fire and Ice | Card Text | Paragraph 3
G11·3 | Vendilion Clique | Card Name
G11·3 | Vendilion Clique | Card Text | Paragraph 1
G11·3 | Vendilion Clique | Card Text | Paragraph 2
G11·3 | Vendilion Clique | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

trans-unit.resname: G11·4 | Entomb | Card Name
G11·4 | Entomb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: G11·5 | Mana Crypt | Card Name
G11·5 | Mana Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.

trans-unit.resname: G11·5 | Mana Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 2
G11·6 | Dark Confidant | Card Name
G11·6 | Dark Confidant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

trans-unit.resname: G11·7 | Doubling Season | Card Name
G11·7 | Doubling Season | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

trans-unit.resname: G11·7 | Doubling Season | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

trans-unit.resname: G11·8 | Goblin Welder | Card Name
G11·8 | Goblin Welder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.
